prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
Standa, zodpovědný za online aktivity v Korálkách Katlas, vedl prezentaci. Více informací o něm lze najít na stanislavvavrik.cz.

---

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Standa, Korálky Katlas, online aktivity, prezentace, stanislavvavrik.cz
